source: Concursul “Loteria fiscală” este organizat în conformitate cu prevederile Regulamentului privind desfășurarea concursului “Loteria fiscală” aprobat prin Hotărârea Guvernului nr.
target: The "Fiscal Lottery" competition is organized in accordance with the provisions of the Regulation on the conduct of the "Fiscal Lottery" competition, approved by Government Decision no.
